text: avaru (yusupharu) tam'ma sahodarana sarakige munna avara sarakugala sodha arambhisidaru. Konege avaru tam'ma sahodarana sarakininda adannu (panapatreyannu) horategedaru. I riti navu yusuphâ€Œrige upaya kalisiddevu. Rajana dharmada prakaravantu avaru atanannu (sahodaranannu) hidiyalu sadhyaviralilla â€“ allahane icchisiddara horatu. Navu, navicchisidavara sthanavannu unnatagolisutteve. Ella jnanigala melobba jnani iruttane
